summary: In the elegant world of artists and musicians, Gertrud ends her marriage to Gustav and takes a lover, the composer Erland Jansson.
cast: Nina Pens Rode|Bendt Rothe|Ebbe Rode|Baard Owe|Axel Strøbye|Karl Gustav Ahlefeldt|Vera Gebuhr|Lars Knutzon|Anna Malberg|Edouard Mielche|Valsø Holm|Carl Johan Hviid|William Knoblauch|Gurli Plesner|Ole Sarvig
keywords: character name as title|narcissism|free will|isolation|downward spiral
title: Gertrud
